name: Nature Unveiled #6 - THE LION KING (Movie)
description:
Man is the only being who carries the knowledge of the circumstance of his death and the memory of his birth in himself. 
Only in the confrontation with himself and the nature it is possible for him to overcome this tragedy. 
The series Nature Unveiled tries to depict this tension in aesthetically abstract 3d images.

Movie, MP4, 10s, 1280 x 720
